address: 182 Lê Đại Hành, District 11, Ho Chi Minh
love_working_here: Working hours is flexible and the standard guideline is between 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM with 1 hour break for lunch.
Staff can start early and finish early to keep in sync with Australia working hours
Staff must advise (ASAP) respective team lead and/or office manager if coming to work late

If staff need to take some time off during working week for personal matters then staff should notify and seek authorisation from department manager. Staff are allowed to work extra hours during the week to make up for those time once approved.
Working from home is possible and will be determined case by case basis by department manager.

Some staff are required to work extra hours during weekend for specific purpose such as Conversion or Installation then Leave in Lieu can be applied. Leave in Lieu is not accumulative and should be used first before Annual Leave.

12 days Annual Leave per annum. Annually leave is accumulated up to 2 years. Company will pay if it is less than 5 days then the company will clear the balance. If It is more than 5 days then The employee will take leave to reduce the balance to 5 days.
Additional one annual leave day for every five years of service
10 days public holidays per annum or as per the government regulations
Sick Leave: 5 days paid per annum (no roll-over). Staff need to produce doctor certificate if sick leave is taken more than one day consecutively.
The company observes all mandatory required leave and other special leaves:
Compassionate Leave
Marriage Leave
Paternity Leave
Maternity Leave
Life and Personal Health Insurance package for full-time and permanent staff.
Annual health check
Month 13th bonus (paid before Tet and depends on company performance. If staff signed HDLD less than 12 months then the bonus is calculated pro-rata)
Loyalty reward Program (Bonus for every 3 years, 5 years of service)
Bonus programs for staff based on performance and projects
Full pay during Probation Period
The OT rate is negotiable between the employer and the employee
Weekly budget for team buildings and social purposes (150,000 VND per week per person)
Fully sponsored trip to Australia for training and work experience purposes where applicable and determined by the head of department
End or mid-year break for the entire team (i.e.: in 2015 we went to Hanoi for 3 days and 2 nights)
End of year gifts before Tet long break
Employee Referral Program
Birthday gift
Fully paid parking
Sport Activity Funding
Education Program Funding

description: We are looking for a QA QC member to manage quality and drive QA excellence for a range of products catering to a global client base. We work in a range of industries on a variety of web and mobile platform and are looking for an active member who is able to adapt their QA abilities to different products and industries.

We are looking for a member who takes pride in quality and improvement. We look for proactive members who also take initiative in helping not only test though also work with the team on improving product features based on observed UX complexities.

We work with a wide range of global clients and varying industries, from EdTech, to FinTech, to HealthTech, and more, with clients from North America, Canada, Hong Kong, Singapore, and Australia. This will give you the opportunity to refine your skills and application knowledge whilst testing different products and platforms.

We are a fully collaborative team, with all members of the product design and development teams in-house, giving you the ability to interact with all members as you help to improve the quality of the products you work on.
Understanding product requirements and functionalities in order to come up with a test plan that covers all cases.
Working closely with project managers, designers, and developers to improve the output quality and complete Sprints in a timely manner.

Listening to clients, understanding their problems and communicating with the team to resolve. We believe it is everyone’s responsibility to maintain an effective communication channel with the clients and keep them happy.
Scheduling test plans to make sure products are properly verified before any important release or launch.
Following agile methodologies and agile processes to ensure the team is able to move at a rapid pace without any road-blocks.
require: Require strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
Require a minimum of 3 years experience in QA/QC field.
Require a deep knowledge of agile and scrum development processes.
Experience with at least one programming language: Java, Javascript, Ruby, Python
Advanced of testing methodologies, testing process, quality models, standards.
Good knowledge and hands-on experience in automation tests using Selenium and Appium with Node.js/Java.
Good knowledge of Load/Performance testing, API testing, SQL database.
Familiar with Cucumber and BDD
Familiar with writing user stories and detailing acceptance criteria.
Experience working in a fast-paced environment such as an agency or service company is a plus.
Familiar with Git, Github and Pull Request.
love_working_here: We work hand-in-hand with our clients to fully invest in their product development and build solutions together for their target market.

We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new design tool, developing your design thinking and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team.

We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand and believe in what they are developing.
We are very selective with our clients, we only work on awesome Products we believe in and that show strong market potential.
We respect you and your personal hours, we keep sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve.
We are fully agile and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity.

You will have ownership over your role, giving you the opportunity to experiment and try new processes to better improve your day-to-day responsibilities. We are always open to improving our processes.

The systems and products you help to build are used by tens of thousands of truck drivers, directly changing their life in better ways. We empower our teams to have end-to-end ownership of what they’re building.

description: We are looking for a Devops Engineer to help manage complex deployments and harden different CI / CD workflows.
This is the first full-time position so we expect the candidate to take initiatives and help improve the devops process across teams and projects.
Our engineers will work directly with the clients in North America therefore we expect excellent communication skills.

We work with a wide range of global clients and varying industries, from EdTech, to FinTech, to HealthTech, and more, with clients from North America, Canada, Hong Kong, Singapore, and Australia. This will give you the opportunity to work with different systems with highest demands on quality.

We are a fully collaborative team, with all members of the product design and development teams in-house, giving you the ability to interact with all members as you help to improve the quality of the products you work on.
Understand system requirements to come up with a good deployment plan.
Work closely with developers, QAs and PMs to ensure applications are configured and deployed properly.
Work closely with clients to understand their requirements on scalability, security, continuity etc and come up with the right solutions.
Harden CI and CD workflows so the team can focus more on delivering their work.
Working closely with project managers, designers, and developers to improve the output quality and complete Sprints in a timely manner.

Listening to clients, understanding their problems and communicating with the team to resolve. We believe it is everyone’s responsibility to maintain an effective communication channel with the clients and keep them happy.
Following agile methodologies and agile processes to ensure the team is able to move at a rapid pace without any road-blocks.

love_working_here: We work hand-in-hand with our clients to fully invest in their product development and build solutions together for their target market.

We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new design tool, developing your design thinking and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team.

We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand and believe in what they are developing.
We are very selective with our clients, we only work on awesome Products we believe in and that show strong market potential.
We respect you and your personal hours, we keep sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve.
We are fully agile and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity.

You will have ownership over your role, giving you the opportunity to experiment and try new processes to better improve your day-to-day responsibilities. We are always open to improving our processes.

With a fast-paced hypergrowth start-up environment, our young, dynamic and passionate team loves to experiment fast, fail fast and keep trying until we win.

The systems and products you help to build are used by tens of thousands of truck drivers, directly changing their life in better ways. We empower our teams to have end-to-end ownership of what they’re building.

address: 150 Le Thi Hong Gam, District 1, Ho Chi Minh
description: Company: Deliveree, a fast-moving logistics technology company.
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Reporting Line: Group CTO
Job Type: Full Time

We are looking for a person with Linux/UNIX System background and the right engineering mindset. If you’re a junior, we’re willing to train you into a razor sharp engineer. If you’re already a senior, expect to receive very challenging tasks.

Now, what is a “right mindset” that we’re looking for? An engineer that will actively get their own hands dirty and work very hard to solve challenging engineering problems. That being said, if you wish to become a technical director, IT manager, CTO in the next few years, don’t apply to us. We need grease monkeys, not bosses.

If you’re still reading, then let’s talk about work. In Deliveree, system engineers work with distributed and asynchronous systems primarily. CAP Theorem, PubSub, Producer/Consumer, kqueue, epoll, kernel scheduler,... kinda stuff. Of course we use many Open Source or Cloud solutions, but we also developed many software in-house for our systems.
Yes, our system engineers are developers too. You will be expected to become a competitive developer yourself to survive here.
require: Thorough understanding of GNU/Linux (strace, tcpdump, awk, sed,...) is required. Deep passion with *nix and FOSS is required too.
Ability to provide 24/7 support is required when there is a Production outage. Midnight or early morning downtimes are very annoying, but it’s a part of the sysadmin job.

We are actually using these, so if you have any experience with any of them, that would be a plus: AWS, Ansible, Python, PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, InfluxDB, Celery, Airflow, MooseFS, GlusterFS, Nginx, Redis, RabbitMQ, Ruby on Rails, Sidekiq, Graylog, Grafana.
Willing to code or learn how to code Python. We’re developing several really cool system software in-house. Distributed, self-healing, self-managing, self-scaling,... kinda stuff.
English proficiency is a must. Our internal communications are in English. Plus you will need to read a lot of English books and documentations for the job.
love_working_here: An exciting opportunity to work with the fastest growing international logistics player.
International environment where you can work and learn with coworkers from different southeast asian markets.

Trường hợp thời gian làm việc chưa đủ 1 năm, mức thưởng sẽ được tính tỉ lệ theo số ngày làm việc cụ thể.

Tháng 9 hàng năm và tăng lương tức thời với những nhân viên có đóng góp cho công ty.

Sau 17:30 và sau 22:00 đều được nghỉ 30 phút trước khi vào làm thêm giờ.
Quản lý chấm công: Quản lý bằng vân tay và thẻ bảo mật.
Nghỉ thứ bảy, chủ nhật và các ngày lễ của Việt Nam.
Nghỉ tết âm lịch: 5 ngày (Mùng 1 tết và trước sau đó 2 ngày) (Sẽ được nghỉ bù nếu ngày nghỉ rơi vào thứ 7, chủ nhật.)
Nghỉ cuối năm dương lịch: 31/12 được nghỉ
Nghỉ ngày kỉ niệm: Ngày nghỉ đặc biệt, có thể đăng ký nghỉ ngày sinh nhật, nghỉ ngày kỷ niệm đám cưới…
Nghỉ chiều của các ngày lễ cho phụ nữ: 8/3, 20/10 (Chỉ dành cho nhân viên nữ. Tuy nhiên, cũng có thể còn phụ thuộc vào tình hình công việc)
Nghỉ ngày lễ của Nhật: Nghỉ theo lịch nghỉ lễ của bên Nhật (Công ty mẹ chỉ định, 3 ngày/1 năm)
1 năm có 12 ngày phép (Cứ 5 năm thâm niên, mỗi năm sẽ được tặng thêm 1 ngày phép, số ngày phép tối đa là 20 ngày)
Số ngày phép năm trước không dùng hết sẽ được chuyển sang sử dụng ở năm sau (tuy nhiên tính cả phần của năm hiện tại và phần của năm cũ, tổng số ngày phép không được quá 30 ngày)
Tối đa chỉ được chuyển ngày phép trong 2 năm.
Có trả tiền làm thêm( Tiền làm thêm được tính từ 19:00)
Chỉ áp dụng với những trường hợp làm thêm có đăng ký và đã được cấp trên phê duyệt.
Trợ cấp chức vụ: Mức trợ cấp tùy theo chức vụ cụ thể.
Trợ cấp ăn trưa:
Trợ cấp chứng chỉ：Trợ cấp hàng tháng hoặc trong 1 thời gian nhất định.
Đối tượng chứng chỉ: Chứng chỉ năng lực tiếng Nhật, Chứng chỉ ISTQB, Chứng chỉ kỹ sư xử lý thông tin.
Chỉ áp dụng với nhân viên chính thức, yêu cầu nộp bản công chứng chứng chỉ.
Thưởng tết: 1 tháng lương
Trường hợp thời gian làm việc chưa đủ 1 năm, mức thưởng sẽ được tính tỉ lệ theo số ngày làm việc cụ thể.
Thưởng kinh doanh: Tháng 10 hàng năm (Tùy tình hình kinh doanh của công ty)
Tháng 9 hàng năm và tăng lương tức thời với những nhân viên có đóng góp cho công ty.
Năm 1 lần / ※2016: Nha Trang, 2017: Đà Nẵng, 2018: Cửa Lò, 2019: Quy Nhơn

Chế độ nghỉ phép theo giờ

description: You can define and reimagine our design philosophy and translate that into tangible design principles. You are a change catalyst for better experiences and interfaces. To achieve this, you can build better design process by architecting and evangelizing a unified Design System across the organization. We expect you to break the rules and redefine them, to help us create the future for the company and our customers through your designs.

You have an eye for pixel-perfect detail and possess a strong blend of interaction and visual design skills and design principles. You have an affinity for consistency, color, typography, and a keen eye for subtle details. Despite this, you have the ability to zoom out from the design detail and weld your design craft to drive strategic business outcomes.

: You research your end-users. You understand business needs and constraints. You push yourself out there for a chance to connect with customers, so you know their pain-points and work restlessly to solve those. Your world class user-centered design takes into consideration research, business drivers, customer segments and usability feedback.

Our stakeholders and team members have years of experience in product development and are a tough crowd when it comes to customer experience. You will need to be pursuasive, confident and know your audience, so that you can communicate sophisticated design concepts and help them see, understand and empathize with the customers whose solutions we develop products for.

You will be required to grow the Design team, guide and inspire them, and inject in them the confidence to operate independently without supervision. You will be expected to mentor and develop your team members and grow the design culture within the organization.

Our team spans 3 countries and is expected to grow even bigger in the future. You will collaborate with people from different backgrounds, mindsets and cultures. Being in this interdisciplinary role, you need to be able to interact and build relationships smoothly across functions.
require: Strong design expertise; mastery of visual, communication and interaction design principles
Fluency in designing entire products and articulating a design system, from information architecture and interaction down to the visual language of individual controls
Fluency in creating designs and artifacts throughout the entire product development lifecycle such as journey maps, wireframes, prototypes
Deep understanding of how design impacts development; ensuring designs are not overly complicated and costly to develop
Proven track record of shipping out high-quality product design to the market
Experience in a variety of design tools including Photoshop, Sketch, InVision and Zeplin, and the ability to prototype rapidly using these design tools and code like HTML and Javascript.
Experience with mobile and tablet design standards (iOS and Android)
Be a natural collaborator in a team environment and have experience leading a team
Ideally at least 5 years’ experience as a User Experience Designer, Interaction or User Interface Designer
Ideally 2+ years in a design leadership role
Fluent in English
Willing to relocate to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Bachelor’s Degree in Interaction Design, Human Computer Interaction or a related discipline is highly desirable
Certified Scrum Product Owner is a plus
Relevant work experience in UX Research, Product Design, UX design, Visual Design is advantage

Vận hành và quản trị các hệ thống Cơ sở dữ liệu, phần mềm lớp giữa và ứng dụng nhằm đảm bảo hệ thống luôn sẵn sàng đáp ứng hoạt động kinh doanh của Tập đoàn Bảo Việt và các đơn vị thành viên

Tổ chức nghiên cứu và tìm hiểu, xây dựng giải pháp, triển khai, vận hành và quản trị các hệ thống liên quan đến lĩnh vực mới về Cơ sở dữ liệu, phần mềm lớp dữ, dữ liệu lớn, … đối với các sản phẩm thương mại và sản phẩm mã nguồn mở cho môi trường theo nhu cầu (on demand) hoặc điện toán đám mây (private/public/ hybrid cloud)
Tham gia các dự án CNTT phục vụ hoạt động kinh doanh của Bảo Việt
require: Trung thực, có tinh thần trách nhiệm, nhanh nhẹn, tự chủ, sáng tạo, tự tin trong giao tiếp;
Tác phong làm việc chuyên nghiệp, có khả năng làm việc độc lập và theo nhóm;
Có khả năng xây dựng mối quan hệ tốt với đồng nghiệp, các cấp quản lý và khách hàng;
Có đủ sức khỏe để đảm bảo thường xuyên hoàn thành nhiệm vụ được giao.

Trình độ chuyên môn: Tốt nghiệp đại học, thuộc một trong các chuyên ngành sau: Khoa học máy tính, kỹ thuật phần mềm, hệ thống thông tin, công nghệ thông tin, tin học ứng dụng, toán tin ứng dụng, công nghệ điện tử, viễn thông, công nghệ kỹ thuật máy tính, kỹ thuật điện tử, viễn thông.
Bằng cấp, chứng chỉ cần thiết: bằng đại học
Ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh đọc hiểu tài liệu tốt. Có khả năng giao tiếp với đối tác nước ngoài bằng tiếng Anh.
Kinh nghiệm nghề nghiệp: tối thiểu 02 năm trở lên trong lĩnh vực Quản trị Cơ sở dữ liệu Oracle tại các doanh nghiệp trong nước hoặc công ty có vốn đầu tư nước ngoài.
Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm quản trị các Cơ sở dữ liệu Oracle, MS SQL Server; quản trị phần mềm lớp giữ (Middleware): Oracle WebLogic Server, IBM WebSphere Application Server.
Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm triển khai ứng dụng CNTT trên các máy chủ chạy hệ điều hành: Unix (Solaris, HP-UX, Linux) và Windows Server.
Ứng viên có các chứng chỉ quốc tế về các sản phẩm, công nghệ về cơ sở dữ liệu/phần mềm lớp giữa của Oracle và/hoặc Microsoft.

Hòa mình vào văn hóa đặc trưng của công ty với mô hình “công ty vui vẻ: làm tới nơi chơi tới bến”. Những hoạt động đầy ắp tiếng cười (team building, lễ hội, họp mặt, sinh hoạt nội bộ, văn hóa văn nghệ,…) gắn kết đồng nghiệp, gắn kết công việc.

Cùng TTT đi đầu thực hiện những hoạt động cộng đồng mang tính nhân văn với quy mô lớn và chuyên nghiệp (tổ chức xây dựng các công trình cho cộng đồng, các chương trình cho trẻ em nghèo, người khuyết tật, gây quỹ ủng hộ chi phí điều trị trẻ em ung bướu,…)
Trải nghiệm các ứng dụng công nghệ ERP, CRM, và đặc biệt là Project Central … tiên tiến mà công ty đã triển khai vào các hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh của doanh nghiệp.

Được tạo điều kiện phát triển sự sáng tạo, tài năng, thăng tiến và hưởng chế độ đãi ngộ tương xứng trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, nơi mà TTT Corporation luôn chú trọng việc nghiên cứu và ứng dụng hệ thống chính sách nhân sự mới.
